mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS order_id, u.user_id, u.order_date, p.id AS product_id, p.name AS product_name, p.price AS product_price FROM UserOrder u JOIN order_product op ON u.id = op.order_id JOIN Product p ON op.product_id = p.id WHERE u.id = #{id}
